ISSUE.TITLE: Not able to add any item to cart as guest user
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Add any product to cart as a guest customer. You can see success notification and item in flyout cart but when you visit to cart page, it shows empty. **Note: I'm using the latest source code, pulled just before an hour from develop branch.** Also, it creates a new guest user on every page refresh. See this video - https://www.loom.com/share/3de21545a0ef4a5eb6ed9d8495bc4b7c

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4501 Fixed problem with creating "page not found" log rows

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #4509 Fixed refactoring problem on "Done or deleted some TODOs"
